sentences.en: If the minuend is larger than the subtrahend, the difference will be positive;
sentences.cn: 如果减数大于减数，差异将是积极的；

sentences.en: In a subtraction operation, the number or quantity subtracted from the minuend.
sentences.cn: 在减法运算中, 从被减数减去的那个数或量.

sentences.en: When the final borrow is 1, the minuend is reentered into the divided storage register.
sentences.cn: 当最后借位为1时, 将被减数重新存入被除数存贮寄存器.

trans.tran_en: the number from which another number, the subtrahend, is to be subtracted
